titleStmt.title: List of artworks identified in the Project "Israels letters to Jo Bonger"
titleStmt.author: Hans Luijten

sourceDesc.p: Generated on the basis of identifiers in letters and writings form data at rkd.nl

listObject.head: List of artworks identified in the Project "Israels letters to Jo Bonger"
